amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt a rule which pertains to workplace health and safety and that is necessary to prevent or reduce the incidence of traumatic injury, cancer or irreversible lung disease at mining facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 227 (Roll no. 41).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 227 (Roll no. 41).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
